channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-6160] KieCamelDecisionTableQuickstartTest failure
item.description:
Fix KieCamelDecisionTableQuickstartTest.java failures on 1.6.x and 1.7.x integration pack branches.

Error looks like an invalid module file coming from kie-eap-distribution :

[0m&amp#27;[31m02:18:52,056 ERROR [org.jboss.as.controller.management-operation] (management-handler-thread - 1) JBAS014612: Operation ("deploy") failed - address: ([("deployment" => "spring-camel-drools-decision-table-1.4.0-SNAPSHOT-eap.war")]) - failure description: {"JBAS014671: Failed services" => {"jboss.module.service.\"deployment.spring-camel-drools-decision-table-1.4.0-SNAPSHOT-eap.war\".main" => "org.jboss.msc.service.StartException in service jboss.module.service.\"deployment.spring-camel-drools-decision-table-1.4.0-SNAPSHOT-eap.war\".main: JBAS018759: Failed to load module: deployment.spring-camel-drools-decision-table-1.4.0-SNAPSHOT-eap.war:main
Caused by: org.jboss.modules.ModuleLoadException: Error loading module from /Users/cunningt/src/platform/fuse-bxms-integ/1.6.x/fuse-bxms-integ/release/eap/itests/target/jboss-eap-6.4/modules/system/layers/bpms/org/springframework/tx/3.x/module.xml
Caused by: org.jboss.modules.xml.XmlPullParserException: Failed to add resource root 'spring-tx-4.3.2.RELEASE.jar' at path 'spring-tx-4.3.2.RELEASE.jar' (position: END_TAG seen ...resources>
n <resource-root path=\"spring-tx-4.3.2.RELEASE.jar\"/>... @20:56) caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: /Users/cunningt/src/platform/fuse-bxms-integ/1.6.x/fuse-bxms-integ/release/eap/itests/target/jboss-eap-6.4/modules/system/layers/bpms/org/springframework/tx/3.x/spring-tx-4.3.2.RELEASE.jar (No such file or directory)"}}
&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[31m02:18:52,058 ERROR [org.jboss.as.server] (management-handler-thread - 1) JBAS015870: Deploy of deployment "spring-camel-drools-decision-table-1.4.0-SNAPSHOT-eap.war" was rolled back with the following failure message:
{"JBAS014671: Failed services" => {"jboss.module.service.\"deployment.spring-camel-drools-decision-table-1.4.0-SNAPSHOT-eap.war\".main" => "org.jboss.msc.service.StartException in service jboss.module.service.\"deployment.spring-camel-drools-decision-table-1.4.0-SNAPSHOT-eap.war\".main: JBAS018759: Failed to load module: deployment.spring-camel-drools-decision-table-1.4.0-SNAPSHOT-eap.war:main
Caused by: org.jboss.modules.ModuleLoadException: Error loading module from /Users/cunningt/src/platform/fuse-bxms-integ/1.6.x/fuse-bxms-integ/release/eap/itests/target/jboss-eap-6.4/modules/system/layers/bpms/org/springframework/tx/3.x/module.xml
Caused by: org.jboss.modules.xml.XmlPullParserException: Failed to add resource root 'spring-tx-4.3.2.RELEASE.jar' at path 'spring-tx-4.3.2.RELEASE.jar' (position: END_TAG seen ...resources>
n <resource-root path=\"spring-tx-4.3.2.RELEASE.jar\"/>... @20:56) caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: /Users/cunningt/src/platform/fuse-bxms-integ/1.6.x/fuse-bxms-integ/release/eap/itests/target/jboss-eap-6.4/modules/system/layers/bpms/org/springframework/tx/3.x/spring-tx-4.3.2.RELEASE.jar (No such file or directory)"}}

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: This should be fixed with the change adding the BxMS maven repository to the test config.
